page.title: 20Cropwell Bishop, Religion
page.content: { Cropwell Bishop Church}is situated on the corner of Church Street.The church is{13th Century,}and it is one of the Wiverton Group.Once long ago it's bells were rung to guide people home from the Nottingham Fairs.Now the bells are rung for weddings,services and for pleasure. Every year there is a Harvest Festival in which the children from the local Primary school participate. The traditional graveyard,surrounded by ancient oak trees,is overflowing with generations of new and old gravestones. { The Chapel}on Nottingham Road is a Methodist Chapel,it was founded in 1845. Immediately in front of the chapel is the Sunday school building, which is also used by the Guides and Scouts. The lady priest of the chapel is Jesse Cobb. { {BY ANGELA BEET.
